article_text:
From Louisiana Gov. Bobby Jindal’s response to a question on Mike Gallagher’s June 10 syndicated talk-radio show about the “moral case” made this week by President Obama for ObamaCare:

Let’s call his remarks exactly what they are. He made the moral case for socialism. Let’s not sugarcoat it, that’s exactly what he believes. He doesn’t hide it, he doesn’t pretend, we shouldn’t either. This isn’t new. Those who favor...

article_summary:
He made the moral case for socialism.
Let’s not sugarcoat it, that’s exactly what he believes.
Bobby Jindal’s response to a question on Mike Gallagher’s June 10 syndicated talk-radio show about the “moral case” made this week by President Obama for ObamaCare:Let’s call his remarks exactly what they are.
He doesn’t hide it, he doesn’t pretend, we shouldn’t either.
From Louisiana Gov.
